periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 87, with temperatures falling to around 85 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 71, with temperatures rising to around 73 overnight. East southeast wind around 2 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.
